channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [GROOVY-5658] SC: issue with optional parameters generating an NPE
item.description:
A problem which seems related to optional parameters (if you remove the optional param in the initPlugins signature, the NPE goes alway):

import groovy.transform.*

@CompileStatic
class Listener {
    void event() {
        initPlugins()
    }
    static initPlugins(ignoreBinary = false) {}
}

def l = new Listener()
l.event()

Yields:

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
